plot: Two self-made millionaires visit a different struggling small business each episode and turn it around with helpful advice and profit-making ideas.
title: Mind Your Own Business
plot_es: Two self-made millionaires visit a different struggling small business each episode and turn it around with helpful advice and profit-making ideas.
plot_en: Two self-made millionaires visit a different struggling small business each episode and turn it around with helpful advice and profit-making ideas.
